# Luca MedTech

> Luca MedTech AS is a Norwegian medical technology company building a platform
> that connects continuous glucose monitors (CGM) directly to hospital electronic
> health records (EHR). Founded in 2025 by Steffen Fonvig, a parent of a child
> with type 1 diabetes.

## About

- [Homepage](https://lucamedtech.no): Main landing page with company overview, product modules, and contact information

## What We Do

Luca MedTech builds three modules on one platform:

1. **Trygg hverdag** (Safe Everyday) — Free for families and caregivers. Consolidated view of a child's blood sugar data, shared securely with grandparents, kindergarten, and school.

2. **Barnehage & skole** (Kindergarten & School) — For staff in kindergartens, schools, and after-school care. Traffic-light display (green/yellow/red) with simple action instructions. No medical background needed.

3. **Sykehusintegrasjon** (Hospital Integration) — For diabetes teams and clinicians. CGM data written automatically into the patient record (DIPS). Population overview and consultation preparation.

## Technology Compatibility

Designed for Norwegian health infrastructure:
- DIPS (hospital EHR system)
- Helsenorge (patient portal)
- HelseID (authentication)
- Noklus Diabetes (diabetes registry)
- Dexcom (CGM sensor)
